required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on February 08, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Study of "Gam-COVID-Vac" Vaccine Against COVID-19 With the Participation of Volunteers of 60 y.o and Older
clinical_study.official_title: An Open Study of the Safety, Tolerability and Immunogenicity of the "Gam-COVID-Vac"Vaccine Against COVID-19 (Solution for Intramuscular Injection) With the Participation of Volunteers in the Age Group Over 60 Years

lead_sponsor.agency: Gamaleya Research Institute of Epidemiology and Microbiology, Health Ministry of the Russian Federation

clinical_study.source: Gamaleya Research Institute of Epidemiology and Microbiology, Health Ministry of the Russian Federation

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study: to assess the safety, tolerability and immunogenicity of the drug "Gam-COVID-Vac", a solution for intramuscular injection, at various times after vaccination in volunteers over 60 years of age

detailed_description.textblock:
An open-ended prospective non-randomized study involving volunteers over the age of 60.
The study will include 110 volunteers. who will receive the test drug according to the prime-boost scheme: the introduction of component 1 will be carried out on the 1st day, and component 2 - on the 21st day of the study. Outpatient monitoring will be performed during 4 visits: on the 7th, 14th, 28th, and 42nd days after the vaccine administration Also two visits will be performed in the phone contact mode for 90 and 180 days

primary_outcome.measure: Changing of antibody levels against the SARS-CoV-2 glycoprotein S in 42 days
primary_outcome.description: Determination of antibody levels against the SARS-CoV-2 glycoprotein S measured by an ELISA vs. baseline values

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events
primary_outcome.time_frame: through the whole study, an average of 180 days
primary_outcome.description: Determination of Number of Participants With Adverse Events

secondary_outcome.measure: Changing of of virus neutralizing antibody titer
secondary_outcome.description: Determination of virus neutralizing antibody titer

secondary_outcome.measure: Changing of antigen-specific cellular immunity level

arm_group.description: the test drug will be administered according to the prime-boost scheme: the introduction of component 1 (Ad26) will be carried out on the 1st day, and component 2(Ad5)- on the 21st day of the study.

intervention.description: combined vector vaccine, 0,5ml/dose+0,5 ml/dose prime-boost immunization in days 1 (component I rAd26-S) and 21(component II rAd5-S)

overall_official.affiliation: Federal state budgetary institution "Central clinical hospital with polyclinic" Of the office Of the President of the Russian Federation

facility.name: Federal state budgetary institution "Central clinical hospital with polyclinic" Of the office Of the President of the Russian Federation
